data.actual_result: The part of the name matching with the search query is still in bold while the rest is normal
data.expected_result: The name should return to normal font weight after being selected
data.short_description: In incoming share screen, search query is still in bold even after selecting a user/channel
data.steps_to_repro: - Share something into Discord - in the field where you can search for users/channels, type the beginning of a name - Tap on one of the suggestions - Observe the item placed in the textfield
